clues: I am a master of arcane arts.
I can combine spells to create new effects.
I have a hook that can pull enemies to me.
I am known for my ability to counter magic.
My ultimate ability is called 'Mana Void'.
I can provide mana regeneration to my allies.
I have a freezing spell that roots enemies in place.
My ultimate ability is called 'Freezing Field'.
I wield a massive sword and can stun enemies.
I am known for my high damage output.
My ultimate ability is called 'God's Strength'.
